rukus.text: Wa 'Innahu Fi 'Ummi Al-Kitabi Ladayna La`aliyun Hakimun
Afanaribu `Ankumu Adh-Dhikra Safhaan 'An Kuntum Qawmaan Musrifina
Wa Kam 'Arsalna Min Nabiyin Fi Al-'Awwalina
Wa Ma Ya'tihim Min Nabiyin 'Illa Kanu Bihi Yastahzi'un
Fa'ahlakna 'Ashadda Minhum Batshaan Wa Maa Mathalu Al-'Awwalina
Wa La'in Sa'altahum Man Khalaqa As-Samawati Wa Al-'Ara Layaqulunna Khalaqahunna Al-`Azizu Al-`Alimu
Al-Ladhi Ja`ala Lakumu Al-'Ara Mahdaan Wa Ja`ala Lakum Fiha Subulaan La`allakum Tahtaduna
Wa Al-Ladhi Nazzala Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Biqadarin Fa'ansharna Bihi Baldatan Maytaan Kadhalika Tukhrajuna
Wa Al-Ladhi Khalaqa Al-'Azwaja Kullaha Wa Ja`ala Lakum Mina Al-Fulki Wa Al-'An`am Ma Tarkabuna
Litastawu `Ala Zuhurihi Thumma Tadhkuru Ni`mata Rabbikum 'Idha Astawaytum `Alayhi Wa Taqulu Subhana Al-Ladhi Sakhkhara Lana Hadha Wa Ma Kunna Lahu Muqrinina
Wa Ja`alu Lahu Min `Ibadihi Juz'aan 'Inna Al-'Insana Lakafurun Mubinun
